xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A module containing functions for common mathematical operations.
Returns the arc cosine of the argument, the result being in the range zero to +π radians.
Returns the arc sine of the argument, the result being in the range -π/2 to +π/2 radians.
Returns the arc tangent of the argument, the result being in the range -π/2 to +π/2 radians.
Returns the cosine of the argument, expressed in radians.
Calculates e (the Euler Constant) raised to the power of $arg
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:double : e (the Euler Constant) raised to the power of a value or expression

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Calculates 10 raised to the power of $arg
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:double : e (the Euler Constant) raised to the power of a value or expression

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the natural logarithm of the argument.
Returns the base-ten logarithm of the argument.
Returns the sine of the argument, expressed in radians.
Returns the non-negative square root of the argument.
Returns the tangent of the argument, expressed in radians.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: atan2
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: atan2($y as xs:double, $x as xs:double) as xs:double

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the angle in radians subtended at the origin by the point on a plane with coordinates (x, y) and the positive x-axis, the result being in the range -π to +π.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:double : the theta component of the point (r, theta) in polar coordinates that corresponds to the point (x, y) in Cartesian coordinates.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: pow
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: pow($value as xs:double, $power as numeric) as xs:double

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the result of raising the first argument to the power of the second.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $power The power to raise the value to
